Reference

All functions

addObject3js()

Generate a new object ID

arrow3js()

Add an arrow to a 3js object

axis3js()

Add axes to an r3js plot

axislines3js()

Add a grid to an r3js plot

background3js()

Set the background color of an r3js plot

box3js()

Add a box to an r3js plot

clippingPlane3js()

Create a clipping plane object

convertCol3js()

Internal function to convert color to an rgb list

debug3js()

Write to the debug file

gllines3js()

Insert a line into an r3js plot

glpoints3js()

Add webgl points to a plot

grid3js()

Add axis grids to an r3js plot

group3js()

Start a new r3js object group

hello()

Hello, World!

highlight3js()

Add an r3js highlight object

lastID()

Find the ID of the last object(s) added

legend3jsalt()

Add a legend to a 3js plot

light3js()

Add a light source to a plot

line3js()

Add a line to a 3js object

lines3js()

Add lines to a 3js object

material3js()

Set material properties of 3js object

mtext3js()

Add text to a margin

plot3js()

Generic r3js plotting function

plot3js.new()

Setup a new r3js plot

plot3js.window()

Set axis limits for a 3js plot

point3js()

Add point to a 3js object

points3js()

Add points to a 3js object

pretty_axis()

Function to generate pretty axis labels that don't go outside range of x

print(<data3js>)

Printing r3js data information

r3jsOutput() renderR3js()

Shiny bindings for r3js

r3js()

Plot r3js data

save3js()

Save an r3js plot to an HTML file

save3jsWidget()

Save an r3js widget to an HTML file

segments3js()

Add lines segments a 3js object

shape3js() shape3js()

Add a generic shape to an 3js plot

sidegrid3js()

Add grid lines to an axis

snap3js()

Take a map snapshot

snapshot3js()

Take a map snapshot

sphere3js()

Add a sphere of defined radius to an r3js plot

string3js()

Add a single text string to a 3js plot

style3js()

Convert arguments to a style setting

surface3js()

Add a surface to an r3js object

text3js()

Add text to a 3js plot

triangle3js()

Add a triangle to an r3js plot
